title: Thank You for Abandoning Our Engagement! - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Broken Engagement   Butlers   Female Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Nobles   Reincarnation   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Shippo Tanuki   しっぽタヌキ
description:
I spend my days as the fiancé of the Third Prince.
Engagement annulled? Is that true…?

Does that mean I can be free now? Thank you!

*This is a story of a young lady who acknowledged her engagement annulment without much thought.>
